name: Kitten Adventure: Ultimate Meow!
storyline:
Meowtopia isn't a peaceful destination for taking a vacation. Legend tells of a strange group of animals hidden deep within the island, believed to be part of mysterious cult…
In 1998, adventurer Lara Croft arrives at Meow Town to relax on the beach. Her vacation is soon disrupted by a lethal gang of poachers who seek to pillage the jungle of its rare and exotic creatures. Confronted by these unscrupulous men (and her own curiosity), Lara decides to explore the island for herself to discover its secrets…
summary:
Kitten Adventure: Ultimate Meow! is a revamp of Kitten Adventure, previously published in 2021.
The revamp includes new gameplay mechanics, improved visuals, and brand new levels added!
